resources.string: This application is result of a project developed in the module Project of the 2nd Year of Bs Honours in Computing (National College of Ireland). The objective of the program is become the learning of proporsional logic ease for the users by using elemets of gamification. The responsable developers are: Correia, Kelly - 14101297; Cozma, Ioana- 13118897; Portela, Elaine - 14101203; Torres, Driele - 14101319. The imagens here provided were based in free vectors available in Freepik: http://www.freepik.com. The proposicional concepts here provided were based in: http://www.criticalthinkeracademy.com/. The font used in some of the images is a free font: Purisa( Thai handwriting outline font.Copyright (©) 2003, 2004 Poonlap Veerathanabutr)
